name: api_rendering_CanvasRenderer
description: A component that will render to the screen after all normal rendering has completed when attached to a Canvas. Designed for GUI application.

properties.name: absoluteDepth
properties.description: Depth of the renderer relative to the root canvas.

properties.name: clippingSoftness
properties.description: The clipping softness to apply to the renderer.

properties.name: cull
properties.description: Indicates whether geometry emitted by this renderer is ignored.

properties.name: cullTransparentMesh
properties.description: Indicates whether geometry emitted by this renderer can be ignored when the vertex color alpha is close to zero for every vertex of the mesh.

properties.name: hasMoved
properties.description: True if any change has occured that would invalidate the positions of generated geometry.

properties.name: hasRectClipping
properties.description: True if rect clipping has been enabled on this renderer. Additional resources: CanvasRenderer.EnableRectClipping, CanvasRenderer.DisableRectClipping.

properties.name: materialCount
properties.description: The number of materials usable by this renderer.

properties.name: popMaterialCount
properties.description: The number of materials usable by this renderer. Used internally for masking.

properties.name: relativeDepth
properties.description: Depth of the renderer realative to the parent canvas.
